last_episode_to_air.name: Wag Wedding Bells
last_episode_to_air.overview: Nicole has her dream wedding; Natalie looks for closure with her ex; Barbie deals with a shocking revelation about the future of her marriage.

name: WAGS
overview: E! takes a wild ride into the world of some of today's hottest professional athletes from the perspective of the women who stand by their side, otherwise known as WAGS (Wives and Girlfriends of Sports Stars). These WAGS are playing the most competitive sport out there: getting and keeping that pro-athlete man. As part of an elite, exclusive group, the WAGS are close friends who are bound together by a strict hierarchy, unspoken rules and plenty of drama - and those who have the coveted ring and a husband with a contract are the ones with all the power! As in sports, this game is all about getting that "W" and this pack knows how to play the field...

episodes.name: The WAG Life
episodes.overview: Natalie and Olivia begin a rivalry with former WWE Diva Barbie Blank. Nicole's relationship insecurities threaten to ruin a fun trip to Las Vegas.

episodes.name: Set a Date or Die!
episodes.overview: Nicole decides to put Natalie and Olivia's issues to the test by arranging a semi-nude photo shoot. Barbie offers an olive branch, but ends up being left disrespected by the cousins once again.

episodes.name: Is It Another Girl?
episodes.overview: Ashley wonders about Dashon's fidelity after her wedding is postponed. Barbie's presence at a party manages to cause quite a stir.

episodes.name: Never Have I Ever
episodes.overview: Natalie and Olivia try to grow their Insta-Famous business, but hit a snag when they don't see eye to eye; Ashley does her best to move on after her wedding gets postponed; Barbie struggles with life after the WWE.

episodes.name: Mexican Standoff
episodes.overview: The WAGs take a trip to Mexico for Natalie's birthday; Autumn second-guesses going with them because of guilt over leaving her kids; Barbie bonds with Natalie and Olivia and checks out a potential wedding venue.

episodes.name: For Love or Money
episodes.overview: Natalie is challenged with choosing between her career and her relationship with Shaun; Nicole gives up a modeling job in New York to spend time with Larry; Barbie gets a surprise package at her home from Sheldon's team.

episodes.name: I Kissed a Girl
episodes.overview: Nicol and Barbie disagree over a trip to the strip club while in Miami to celebrate Barbie's bachelorette party. Plus, Natalie argues with Shaun when she forgets to mention the trip.

episodes.name: You're in a Fake Relationship
episodes.overview: Natalie gets cold feet about taking her relationship with Shaun to the next level. Sasha has to put her life on hold when there are complications with her pregnancy. Olivia's single status finally takes a promising turn while Autumn accuses Natalie of being in a fake relationship.

episodes.name: WAGS Collide
episodes.overview: Sophia brings Autumn's husband's cheating scandal to light; Natalie confronts Sasha; Barbie plans a wedding; Olivia gets serious with her new boyfriend.

episodes.name: Foul Play
episodes.overview: Barbie throws the first pitch at Spring Training, but an unresolved feud between Autumn and Natalie threatens to ruin the trip. Nicole finds a new way to cope with trust issues while away from Larry. Sophia moves into Olivia's apartment without permission.

episodes.name: DM Drama
episodes.overview: Olivia reveals to new WAG Tia that her boyfriend may not be as trustworthy as she thought. Tia plots revenge and moves in on Olivia's man and his mum. Natalie runs into Shaun, forcing her to deal with her emotions, and Barbie gets devastating news about her wedding.

episodes.name: Secrets in Sin City
episodes.overview: Natalie invites Shaun to Vegas, in hopes of mending their relationship. But when Nicole meddles in her love life, her loyalty is questioned. Sasha is shocked to find out that she's not invited to Barbie's wedding.

episodes.name: Cheat Sheet
episodes.overview: Barbie becomes enraged when she finds out that Larry may propose to Nicole during her wedding; Tia creates an opportunity for Natalie and Olivia at New York Fashion Week, but Olivia gets distracted when her sister makes a move on her man.

episodes.name: A WAG Wedding
episodes.overview: Barbie's wedding kicks off in Cabo San Lucas, Olivia's date drops out of the wedding and Natalie thinks it might be Sophia's fault, and Nicole's wedding obsession causes complications.

episodes.name: WAG Interference
episodes.overview: Tia meets Larry's Ex-Girlfriend who accuses Nicole of being a home wrecker. Olivia confronts Marcedes for ditching her in Cabo. Barbie and Autumn face off about the future of their friendship.

episodes.name: Moving on Out
episodes.overview: Hollywood Medium star Tyler Henry makes an emotional visit to the WAGS. Nicole makes a drastic decision that could end her relationship with Larry, Olivia faces a big decision about her future with Marcedes, and Sasha puts on a musical performance.

episodes.name: New Blood
episodes.overview: Autumn introduces several LA Rams wives to the group, as two WAG worlds collide. Olivia deals with the pressure of a long-distance relationship, while balancing work issues with Natalie. Nicole questions her decision to move out.

episodes.name: Pegging Party
episodes.overview: Natalie and Olivia are invited to be brand ambassadors to Thailand while Larry reveals his intentions for a future with Nicole. Barbie auditions for `Days of our Lives'.

episodes.name: Trouble in Paradise
episodes.overview: Nicole's crazy antics cause Larry to contemplate calling off the proposal, Sasha and Tia come to blows over a secret nickname and Sophia hits it off with a new athlete.

episodes.name: Thai The Knot
episodes.overview: The WAGS explore Phuket in the season finale. Tia shares a huge secret about her dating life and Larry has a surprise for Nicole.

episodes.name: Wag War
episodes.overview: In the Season 3 premiere, new WAG, Dominique Penn, attempts to mend the rift between mutual friends—and former besties—Sasha and Autumn. Meanwhile, Nicole searches for a wedding venue; and Natalie copes with her recent breakup.

episodes.name: Thirsty Thots
episodes.overview: Sasha invites Natalie and Olivia to her hometown in Trinidad; Olivia deals with an Instagram faux pas; new WAG Michelle Quick struggles to deal with ``thirsty LA women'' who may, or may not be after her husband.

episodes.name: Trouble in Paradise
episodes.overview: Nicole deals with the repercussions of leaving WAGS out of her wedding festivities; Autumn questions Dom's loyalty; Barbie deals with marriage issues; Natalie goes on her first real date, post breakup.

episodes.name: 50 Shades of Shade
episodes.overview: Barbie sees a therapist in hopes of getting her marriage back on track; Natalie gets her groove back after she gives dating another try; Autumn throws a game night that ends in tears.

episodes.name: No Ring, No Deal
episodes.overview: Autumn and Sasha try to hash out their problems; Natalie and Olivia launch their clothing line; Nicole is thrown for a loop when Larry doesn't want to wear a wedding ring.

episodes.name: Bachelorette Brawl
episodes.overview: Michelle and Brian deal with unexpected trade news; Nicole worries about Larry's bachelor party.

episodes.name: Party Crasher
episodes.overview: Nicole decides to crash Larry's bachelor party in Columbia; Michelle deals with the death of an ex.

episodes.name: Wag Wedding Bells
episodes.overview: Nicole has her dream wedding; Natalie looks for closure with her ex; Barbie deals with a shocking revelation about the future of her marriage.
